divs: Sighting DetailsWent out on second floor deck and saw a aerial equilateral triangle with lights on edges moving overhead without any noise at all. It moved from east to west. It moved in a straight line and eventually dropped below the hill line. It was awesome and I wanted it to land in the yard but it didn't. I called my then daughter-in-law outside and she saw it too. I then lived in Bethlehem, PA.
Summary: Aerial triangular object with lights on edges moving slowly without noise.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Emmaus
There were no other sightings in Emmaus on or around November 30th 2000
